DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of Adapalene Gel 0.3% in the treatment of atrophic acne scars.
DOC.brief_title: Adapalene Gel 0.3% in the Treatment of Atrophic Acne Scars
DOC.criteria: Male or female subjects of any race, aged 18 to 50 years inclusive Subjects with a past history of acne and with moderate to severe facial atrophic acne scars Subjects with active inflammatory acne lesions Subjects with hypertrophic acne scars
